definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Officials in Nicosia reject the claims.
sentences.chinese: 尼科西亞的官員們否認這些說法。

sentences.english: The heart of Nicosia is Eleftheria Square, also known as Freedom Square.
sentences.chinese: 心臟尼科西亞是塞浦路斯廣場，也稱爲自由廣場。

sentences.english: Nicosia is the capital and largest city in Cyprus.
sentences.chinese: 尼科西亞是首都及最大的城市，在塞浦路斯。

sentences.english: The capital city, Nicosia, is located to the north-east of the centre of the island.
sentences.chinese: 其首都尼科西亞，位於該島中心地區東北部。
